item.description:
New Hampshire's Premier First Amendment Assembly And After Hours Event

MAIN EVENT:

WHERE: Jaffrey, NH ,Downtown Common & Band Stand(1 River st.)

WHEN: Saturday, August 23rd 2008. 11 AM - 5 PM

ADMISSION: Free BOOTH,VENDOR,TABLE SPOTS: Free

Revolutionary Guns and Cannons Re-enactments, Speakers, Bands, Vendors, Food, and More!

ENCAMPMENT: Friday, August 22nd.,12-10PM ,Sawyers Field (5Min. From Downtown Main Event) Captain Morrill Revolutionary Artillery Co. , Volunteers & Participant Camping: FREE. Grilles Provided. Bring Food & Beverages.Volunteers Meeting at 7 PM across Street at Dillon Lodge. Dreamline Band will Perform for Volunteers 9-11PM.

AFTER HOURS: Saturday, August 23rd 7PM through Sunday, August 24th, Admission: FREE. Secluded Historic Dillon Lodge (across from Sawyers Field) Bands Play Dusk To Dawn, Best N.H. Spicket Pig Roast 7-10PM, Camper Barbecue Grilles Provided for B.Y.O. Food,Beverages & Chairs. Sunday C.Y.O. Fresh Coll's Eggs Breakfast 6-11 AM. Open Stage 6 AM - 1 PM. Check Out By 3 PM.

PARTICIPANTS EVENING EVENT: Saturday, August 23rd, 7 PM - 10 PM. Admission: FREE. Spectator/ Volunteers Training & Swearing In By Captain Morrill Of Morrill's Artillery Co. For Participation In Battle Reenactment At 7.30 PM, Battle Against The British at 8 PM. After Dark Cannons Volleys To Mt. Monadnock At 9 PM, Best Spicket Pig Roast Dinner in N.H. 7-10PM, Live Music,Vendors, Sulky Rides, Tours and More!

TOPICS:



US Constitution Second Amendment Gun Rights

U.S. & N.H. Constitution Rights Enforcement

N.H. Motto History & Preservation

Radio Frequency I.D./ SPYCHIPS/National ID, Privacy Rights

Mount Monadnock Zone Preservation

Helmet Choice Rights Advocacy

Medicinal Marijuana Regulation Legislation Support

Constitutional Religious Rights Enforcement

World Trade Towers Revelations

SPEAKERS:

Evan Nappen, Second amendment attorney "Gun Laws and The Constitution". John B. Hunt, NH House Representitive, "NH State Motto and Relation To Nanny Laws". Dr. Katherine Albrecht, Spychips author and Radio Host, "Privacy Rights Enforment". David Welch, N.H. House Representative,"National Mandated ID and Privacy Rights".Daniel Itse,NH Liberty Alliance, "True Sovereigns Of New Hampshire". Mark Gauthier,Owner Loud Pipes Saloon 2,"Helmet Laws Rights To Choice". Craig Brandon, Author, "Monadnock: More Than A Mountain". Matt Simon,NH Commonsense,"Marijuana Myths". Jonathon Perri, Students For Sensible Drug Policies, "Drug Policies Reforms". Howard Wilson, NH Libertarian Party, "Citizens Rights To Bear Arms".Garrett Lear, The Patriot Pastor "Heroes Of American Liberty". Jennifer Coffey, NH Coordinator Second Amendment Sisters, "Womans Gun Rights". George Corrette, Monadnock 911 Truth Alliance, "World Trade Towers Revelations".

ORGANIZATIONS/VENDORS:

New Hampshire Liberty Alliance,Free State Project, New Hampshire Libertarian Party, CASPIAN, National Heritage Center For Constitutional Studies, New Hampshire Common Sense, Second Amendment Sisters, Ron Paul Meet Up, Coalition Of N.H. Taxpayers, Friends Of Immigration Law Enforcement, C.A.A.C.P., National Society Sons Of The American Revolution, The Well Of Living Water-Christian Ministries, Military Order Of The Purple Hearts, Students For Sensible Drug Policy, Monadnock 911 Truth Alliance, The John Birch Society, Pro-Gun N.H. Inc., And More To Be Announced.

ARTILLERY DEMONSTRATIONS:

Captain Morrill's Company, Franklin, NH. Kegs gunpowder donated by Atlas Fire Works Co.

BANDS:

Mindsetx,Salem NH/ The Ale Marys,Littleton,MA./Lowercasep,Lowell Ma./ Goosepimp Orchestra,Lowell,Ma./Dream Line,Derry,NH/ Chord-Wood,Hampstead,NH/ Dave Crespo & The After Party,Boston,MA./ Ghost Dinner Band,Antrim,NH/ Double Yellow,Nashua,NH/ Bullet Head,Natick,MA./ Josh Noone & Federal Crime, Thorndike,MA./ Blue Eyed Fools, Attleborough,MA./ More To Be Announced /Audio,Lighting & Benefit Bands Promotions Donated by Transit Music Group,Candia,NH.

Reservations For Free Organizational Booths And Camping Still Available.

Volunteers, Promoters and Fund Raisers Are Still Needed, Please Register. Thank You, Organizer & Chairman, Jean Coutu ,caacp01@aol.com
